title: Steelers-Browns, Tom Brady, QBs, and Cam Newton
itunes:title: Steelers-Browns, Tom Brady, QBs, and Cam Newton
description:
Colin discusses how the Steelers have overcome adversity this season while the Browns have not, Tom Brady not wanting to retire anytime soon, available QBs, and possible destinations for Cam Newton after this season. Guests include Greg Jennings, Greg Cosell, and Will Blackmon.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
